channel.title: Tutorial Island
channel.description: When you start a new account now Jagex has you in burthorpe, is there anyway to skip it and just go to varrock/lumby like normal?

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

You start off as a member now?
Good God, i’ve been gone a long time.

On topic = you need to make an account with an email address, so you have to confirm it.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Yes you can, its in the tasks bit. Google it, took me like 2mins of googling to find out lul…

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

You need to confirm your email before the game will let you login, which also means you get the 14 day trial

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

same i had to verify my account before playing it wouldnt let me play if i didnt

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“l0gik, post:3, topic:440822”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=543492.msg3983843#msg3983843 date=1335636411]

[quote author=l0gik link=topic=543492.msg3983841#msg3983841 date=1335636246]

Oh nice call on jagex part…

Kindda gay in my opinion.

To bypass it, once you get out of the cave, click on the task icon
then view all (or some shit)
then options, and select ‘tutorial off’

or just dont accept the email to make it a mem acc.
[/quote]i made two accounts and couldn’t find a way to log in without verifying it through that email, but maybe i’m just dumb

really? dont reload the client page. just keep it there for a few seconds…i just made an acc and it worked fine. >_>
[/quote]i even relogged and it said that i should verify it or something[/quote]
You dont need to relog…

and i just made an account named Xfe
win.

Read full topic

Burthope is f2p?

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Nope, the start point of the game is now Burthorpe.

You can turn off tutorial mode however by going to the tasks interface, that gets you right into the game without having to go through the new tutorial

Read full topic

item.description:
